TopicTitle: Better Together! Stranding and Rescuing As Many Kerbals.

Articles.Content:
This is a little ridiculous.  Stranding and Rescuing as many Kerbals as possible. I know. Its a very odd challenge. It will probably receive a lot of criticism. But the reason on why I posted this challenge because over the years of Kerbal Space Program's development people have been helping each other. Like Matt Lowne's Blunderbirds (which is an awesome season, especially the music videos in MY OPPINION).  So the goal of this challenge is to see how many Kerbals you can strand and then rescue. You can do this with a friend or just by yourself. You could save all your mission that have failed and return those Kerbal home safely. And I mean, jack up some points  and popularity but like that doesn't matter.  

Kerbin 0 points

The Mun 1 point

Minmus 1 point

Duna 2 pionts

Ike 2.5 points

Eve 4 points

Gilly 2 points

Moho 3 points

Dres 4 points

Jool 4 points

Laythe 4.5 points

Tylo 6 points

Pol 3.5 points

Bop 3.5 points

Vall 4.5 points

Eeloo 7 points

Sun 3 pionts
